mapper.select: select count(*) from product where category_code=#{category_code}

select * from (select p.product_no, product_img, product_name, product_price, product_desc, count(*) from product p, customerOrder_detail c where c.product_no=p.product_no group by p.product_no, product_img, product_name, product_price,product_desc order by count(*) desc) where rownum <= 8
select product_no,product_img, product_name, product_price,product_desc from product where product_margin=1
select product_no,product_img, product_name,product_desc, product_price from product where product_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

select product_no,category_code,product_name from (select rownum num,product_no,category_code,product_name from (select product_no,category_code,product_name from product order by product_no desc)) where num between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into product ( product_no, category_code, product_name, product_price, product_desc, product_date, product_img, product_margin, product_detail) values(#{product_no},#{category_code},#{product_name},#{product_price},#{product_desc},sysdate,#{product_img},0,#{product_detail})
mapper.update: update product set product_name=#{product_name},product_price = #{product_price},product_desc=#{product_desc}, product_margin=#{product_margin} where product_no=#{product_no}
mapper.select: select product.product_no, product_name from product left outer join (select product_no, count(product_no) cnt from customerOrder_detail group by product_no) a on product.product_no=a.product_no where category_code=#{category_code} order by a.cnt desc
